law.catch_line: Except as provided for in § 10-123 of this subtitle, the court may not cause a copy of the earnings...
law.text: Except as provided for in § 10-123 of this subtitle, the court may not cause a copy of the earnings withholding order to be served on any employer of the obligor until the court receives a request for service of the earnings withholding order under § 10-126 of this subtitle and the requirements of §§ 10-127 and 10-133 of this subtitle have been met.
